metadata.title: Décret de la Convention nationale, du 16e. jour de floréal, an second de la République française, une & indivisible, portant que les maisons & jardins de Saint-Cloud, Bellevue, Versailles, &c. seront conservés

metadata.notes: Irregular Pagination. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. No title page found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
